item.description: Are you sick of working 9 to 5 Monday through Friday and not getting to go to the beach? I know I am! Lets fix that by meeting for some after work beach time! I'll bring my bocce ball set, I have someone else bringing Kan Jam ( a fun game involving throwing and hitting a Frisbee into a plastic barrel) and people are free to bring whatever else they want. We can probably get a couple good hours in....if it works out I'll schedule it more often. Note: Parking is free after 3:30!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet on the wooden boardwalk near the showers/food stand area
item.name: Beach Games!
